statements: SELECT * FROM energy_consumption;
SELECT appliance_name, energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption WHERE resource_type = 'electricity';
SELECT id, appliance_name FROM energy_consumption ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT AVG(energy_consumed) AS average_energy, resource_type FROM energy_consumption GROUP BY resource_type;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption WHERE energy_consumed > 50 AND resource_type = 'gas' ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption WHERE energy_consumed > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT appliance_name, SUM(energy_consumed) AS total_energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption GROUP BY appliance_name;
SELECT id, appliance_name, energy_consumed, resource_type, DATE(timestamp) AS date_consumed FROM energy_consumption WHERE resource_type = 'electricity';
SELECT AVG(energy_consumed) AS average_consumption, MAX(energy_consumed) AS max_consumption FROM energy_consumption;
SELECT DISTINCT resource_type, COUNT(DISTINCT appliance_name) AS num_appliances FROM energy_consumption GROUP BY resource_type ORDER BY num_appliances DESC;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption;
SELECT building_name, consumed_units FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE consumed_units > 100;
SELECT building_name, timestamp FROM EnergyConsumption ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT building_name, SUM(consumed_units) AS total_consumed_units FROM EnergyConsumption GROUP BY building_name;
SELECT * FROM ResourceConservation WHERE saved_units > 50;
SELECT building_name, consumed_units, timestamp FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE consumed_units > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT building_name, SUM(consumed_units) AS total_consumed_units FROM EnergyConsumption GROUP BY building_name HAVING total_consumed_units > 500 ORDER BY total_consumed_units DESC;
SELECT building_name, resource_type, saved_units FROM ResourceConservation WHERE resource_type = 'water' ORDER BY saved_units DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT building_name, MAX(saved_units) AS max_saved_units FROM ResourceConservation GROUP BY building_name ORDER BY max_saved_units DESC;

SELECT EnergyConsumption.building_name, ResourceConservation.building_name, SUM(EnergyConsumption.consumed_units) AS total_consumed_units, SUM(ResourceConservation.saved_units) AS total_saved_units FROM EnergyConsumption INNER JOIN ResourceConservation ON EnergyConsumption.building_name = ResourceConservation.building_name GROUP BY EnergyConsumption.building_name, ResourceConservation.building_name HAVING total_consumed_units > 100 AND total_saved_units > 50 ORDER BY total_consumed_units DESC, total_saved_units DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT location_id, electricity_consumption FROM EnergyConsumption;
SELECT * FROM ResourceConsumption WHERE resource_type = 'electricity';
SELECT location_id, resource_name, efficiency_score FROM EfficiencyMonitoring WHERE efficiency_score > 0.8;
SELECT SUM(electricity_consumption) AS total_electricity_consumption FROM EnergyConsumption;
SELECT location_id, resource_name, resource_amount FROM EfficiencyMonitoring INNER JOIN ResourceConsumption ON EfficiencyMonitoring.resource_id = ResourceConsumption.resource_id;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption;
SELECT location_id, electricity_consumption, water_consumption FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE electricity_consumption > 1000;
SELECT r.resource_name, e.electricity_consumption, e.water_consumption FROM ResourceConsumption r JOIN EnergyConsumption e ON r.resource_id = e.location_id;

SELECT e.electricity_consumption, r.resource_type, em.efficiency_score FROM EnergyConsumption e JOIN EfficiencyMonitoring em ON e.location_id = em.location_id JOIN ResourceConsumption r ON em.resource_id = r.resource_id;

SELECT AVG(e.electricity_consumption) as avg_electricity_consumption, MAX(r.resource_amount) as max_resource_amount FROM EnergyConsumption e JOIN ResourceConsumption r ON e.location_id = r.resource_id WHERE e.water_consumption < 5000;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption;
SELECT appliance_id, energy_usage FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE appliance_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM ResourceConsumption ORDER BY usage_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM ConservationAreas WHERE conservation_status = true;
SELECT area_name, area_id FROM ConservationAreas WHERE area_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE energy_usage > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT appliance_id, SUM(energy_usage) AS total_energy FROM EnergyConsumption GROUP BY appliance_id;
SELECT device_id, resource_type, SUM(usage_amount) FROM ResourceConsumption GROUP BY device_id, resource_type HAVING SUM(usage_amount) > 500;
SELECT * FROM ConservationAreas WHERE conservation_status = TRUE ORDER BY area_id;
SELECT metric_name, AVG(metric_value) AS avg_value FROM EfficiencyMetrics GROUP BY metric_name HAVING AVG(metric_value) > 0.5;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_location, energy_usage FROM EnergyConsumption;
SELECT * FROM ResourceConsumption WHERE quantity_used > 100;
SELECT efficiency_score, sensor_id, resource_id FROM EfficiencyMetrics ORDER BY efficiency_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM ConservationAreas WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT area_name, sensor_id FROM ConservationAreas WHERE conservation_id IN (1,2,3);
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption;
SELECT sensor_location, energy_usage FROM EnergyConsumption ORDER BY energy_usage DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_location FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE sensor_location LIKE '%Kitchen%';
SELECT * FROM EfficiencyMetrics WHERE efficiency_score > 80;

SELECT c.area_name, e.efficiency_score, r.recommendation_text FROM ConservationAreas c JOIN EfficiencyMetrics e ON c.sensor_id = e.sensor_id JOIN ConservationRecommendations r ON c.conservation_id = r.conservation_id;
